question_id: Tampilkan nama aktor dan judul film yang dirilis tahun 2006 dengan rating 'PG'. Di mana judul filmnya mengandung kata pilot.
sql_query:
SELECT
    a.first_name AS nama_aktor,
    m.title AS judul_film
FROM
    film m
JOIN
    film_actor fa ON m.film_id = fa.film_id
JOIN
    actor a ON fa.actor_id = a.actor_id
WHERE
    m.release_year = 2006
    AND m.rating = 'PG'
    AND m.description LIKE '%pilot%'
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    a.first_name AS nama_aktor,
    m.title AS judul_film
FROM
    film m
JOIN
    film_actor fa ON m.film_id = fa.film_id
JOIN
    actor a ON fa.actor_id = a.actor_id
WHERE
    m.release_year = 2006
    AND m.rating = 'PG'
    AND m.description LIKE '%pilot%';
```
